verses.roman:
mā drākṣīḥ kṣīṇa-puṇyān kvacid api
bhagavad-bhakti-hīnān manuṣyān

synonyms: mā—do not; drākṣīḥ—see; kṣīṇa-puṇyān—who are bereft of all piety; kvacit api—at any time; bhagavat-bhakti-hīnān—who are bereft of Kṛṣṇa consciousness and devotional service; manuṣyān—persons.
translation: " One should not even see those who are bereft of devotional service in Kṛṣṇa consciousness and who are therefore devoid of pious activities.
